migration.reason: Translation structure has been migrated to a new modular organization for better maintainability
migration.instructions: Update your code to use the new translation keys from features.account.profile.* instead of profile.*
migration.doNotUse: DO NOT use translations from this file - they are maintained only for backwards compatibility

profile.personalInfoDesc: Update your name, contact information, and profile picture
profile.languageDesc: Choose your preferred language for the app
profile.currencyDesc: Select your preferred currency for prices and payments
profile.themeDarkDesc: Use dark theme for better visibility in low light
profile.themeLightDesc: Use light theme for better visibility in bright light
profile.currencyChangeError: Failed to change currency. Please try again.

currencyInfo.title: Currency Information
currencyInfo.description: Your currency preference will be used throughout the app for displaying prices and payments. You can change this at any time.

profile.hostModeDesc: Switch between host and traveler modes
profile.helpCenterDesc: Get help and find answers to common questions
profile.giveFeedbackDesc: Share your thoughts and suggestions with us
profile.resetAppDesc: Fix issues by clearing cached data

languageInfo.title: Language Information
languageInfo.description: Choose your preferred language for the app interface. This will change all text and messages to your selected language.

themeInfo.title: Theme Information
themeInfo.description: Choose how the app looks. System will follow your device's theme setting.

personalInfoForm.title: Personal Information
personalInfoForm.description: Update your personal details and contact information

helpCenterInfo.title: Help Center
helpCenterInfo.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions and get support for using the app.

feedbackInfo.title: Give Feedback
feedbackInfo.description: We'd love to hear from you! Share your thoughts, suggestions, or report any issues you've encountered.

termsInfo.title: Terms of Service
termsInfo.description: Read our terms and conditions that govern your use of the app.

upload.imageTooLarge: Image size must be less than {{maxSize}}MB
upload.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported image format. Please use JPEG, PNG, or WebP
upload.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again
